name: The Fastest Skeleton
description:
You are a SKELETON

All sensual poses appearing in this work are ficticious. Any resemblance to real persons, living or dead, is purely coincidential.

CLIMB THE TOWER AS FAST AS YOU CAN.

IT IS NECESSARY

TO

GO

FAST

MAYBE TAKE A VIDEO OF HOW YOU DID IT,

HOW FAST CAN YOU CLIMB THE TOWER?

OH YEAH, ALSO THIS GAME IS SPOOKY AND SCARY, SO BE FRIGHTENED.

BUT MOSTLY, BE FAST.

( then send me a the screenshot or video, that would be amazing )

PLEASE NOTE* This game is FREE! Donate if you want to! (' U ')b

Just press [No thanks, just take me to the downloads] after [Download Now]
